## createMySQLDatabaseConnectionProvider() function

Create database connection provider.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createMySQLDatabaseConnectionProvider(app: Application, options: string | MySQLConnectionOptions | MySQLConnectionPoolOptions): Promise<DatabaseConnectionProvider>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  app | <code>Application</code> | The application. |
|  options | <code>string &#124; MySQLConnectionOptions &#124; MySQLConnectionPoolOptions</code> | Connection or connection pool options. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<DatabaseConnectionProvider>`

## Remarks

Depending on what type of options are passing in, a connection pool or a single shared connection provider is created. The single shared connection provider does not allow concurrent connection use.
